title: Typophile Email is temporarily down
content:
Submitted by [Jared Benson](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224214301/http:/typophile.com/user/3 "View user profile.") : 7.Dec.2006 2.02pm 

Due to an onslaught of spam, for much too long, we’ve been forced to shut down @typophile.com email on a temporary basis. If you’re dependent on your Typophile email alias, now would be a good time to use another address until further notice. Thank you.
author: Jared Benson
